General.Name: Kao Fong Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Kao Fong Machinery Co., Ltd operates in the mold processing industry in Taiwan, Asia, the United States, Oceania, Africa, the Middle East, and Europe. It offers double-column, vertical, horizontal, high speed double-column, moving cross rail double column, and gantry double-column machining centers, as well as drilling and tapping machining centers. The company was formerly known as Kao Fong Iron Factory and changed its name to Kao Fong Machinery Co., Ltd. in 1972. Kao Fong Machinery Co., Ltd was founded in 1968 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
